thread.title: Nobel literature prize postponed over scandal

title: Nobel literature prize postponed over scandal
text:
Nobel literature prize postponed over scandal 12:36pm BST - 01:47
The Nobel literature prize for 2018 is set to be awarded next year. The Swedish Academy that hands out the award has been rocked by sexual misconduct allegations. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The Nobel literature prize for 2018 is set to be awarded next year. The Swedish Academy that hands out the award has been rocked by sexual misconduct allegations. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2rjYtbL
